message: So if you are an ethical person, and refuse to give a cent toward killing foreign people's in their own land, so that multinational corporations like Halliburton execs can live above any law with their publicly-funded Blackwater hit squads, should you cut your tax contribution back by 70%?
Gee Tee Dude, that isn't funny.
is breaking someone's neck while in handcuffs legal? you couldn't be more simple minded if you were forced to be.

Nice recitation of Fox news talking points. Have you travelled to Europe and actually talked to foreign people? I travelled to Europe 10 times between 2001-2007, and George Bush was considered a Nazi, much like his father and grandfather. I see no evidence of the Constitution being shredded for Shiria Law. Sharia Law is not very common in the Muslim World, much less in America. That would be like saying, """"America Lynches Black folks"""" based on looking at the Klan in the segregation days. Your whole construct is based on fallacy, therefore you are an Idiot.
Definitley not a good picture.
